title: ISic003972. I.Sicily inscription 003972
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἀπάτη

Apparatus criticus

Meligunìs Lipára XII

translation

commentary

Under the name there are traces of unidentifiable letters, most likely pertaining to an older inscription which was scraped to alllow the inscribing of the current one.

bibliography

  • 348 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
